roleset.name: be confirmed for the presence of (like with a medical test)

example.text: Twenty-one of 34 lymph nodes positive for metastatic spread.
example.amr: (p / positive-03 :ARG1 (a / anatomical-site :quant 21 :name (n / name :op1 "lymph" :op2 "node") :ARG1-of (i2 / include-91 :ARG2 (a2 / anatomical-site :quant 34 :name (n2 / name :op1 "lymph" :op2 "node")))) :ARG2 (s / spread-02 :mod (m / metastasize-101 :ARG2 a)))
